parameters.name: P1x
parameters.description: x coordinate of start point in meters

parameters.name: P1y
parameters.description: y coordinate of start point in meters

parameters.name: P2x
parameters.description: x coordinate of end point in meters

parameters.name: P2y
parameters.description: y coordinate of end point in meters

parameters.name: ArcTypeIn
parameters.description: Type of tangent arc as defined in swTangentArcTypes_e

title: IModelDoc2.CreateTangentArc2
signature:
System.Boolean CreateTangentArc2( 
   System.Double
P1x
,
   System.Double
P1y
,
   System.Double
P1z
,
   System.Double
P2x
,

P2y
,
   System.Double
P2z
,
   System.Int32

)

parameters.name: P1x
parameters.description: x coordinate of start point in meters

parameters.name: P1y
parameters.description: y coordinate of start point in meters

parameters.name: P2x
parameters.description: x coordinate of end point in meters

parameters.name: P2y
parameters.description: y coordinate of end point in meters

parameters.name: ArcTypeIn
parameters.description: Type of tangent arc as defined in swTangentArcTypes_e

remarks:
This method can only create 2D tangent arcs. Use
ISketchManager::CreateTangentArc
to create 3D tangent arcs.
